sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { View, Text, Image, ScrollView } from 'react-native';
import Swiper from 'react-native-swiper';

const HomeScreen = () => {
  return (
    <ScrollView>
      <View>
        <Text>Popular Categories</Text>
        <ScrollView horizontal={true}>
          <View>
            <Text>Breakfast</Text>
          </View>
          <View>
            <Text>Ramen</Text>
          </View>
          <View>
            <Text>Sandwiches</Text>
          </View>
          <View>
            <Text>Mexican</Text>
          </View>
        </ScrollView>
      </View>

      <View>
        <Text>Best Deals</Text>
        <Swiper autoplay={true} height={200}>
          <View>
            <Image source={require('../assets/favicon.png')} />
            <Text>Ramen</Text>
          </View>
          {/* Add more views for more images */}
        </Swiper>
      </View>

      <View>
        <Text>Most Popular</Text>
        <View>
          <Image source={require('../assets/favicon.png')} />
          <Text>Forbidden Salad - $11.00</Text>
        </View>
      </View>
    </ScrollView>
  );
};

export default HomeScreen;
